default.content_zh: 你的交互风格指数已记录，保持与 AI 的平衡沟通，既不过于详细也不过于简洁。
default.content_en: Your style index is recorded. Keep a balanced communication with AI—neither too detailed nor too concise.

00000.content_zh: 逻辑、耐心、细节、探索、反馈皆偏克制——你像一把只做一件事的扳手，精准而寡言。
00000.content_en: Low on logic, patience, detail, exploration and feedback—you're like a wrench that does one thing well, precise and quiet.

10111.content_zh: 各维度均衡，不偏不倚。在赛博世界里，平庸有时是最稳的生存策略。
10111.content_en: All dimensions in balance. In the cyber world, mediocrity is sometimes the steadiest survival strategy.

11111.content_zh: LPDEF 五维皆中位，你是那种让产品与代码都能接受的「逻辑平衡大师」。
11111.content_en: All five LPDEF dimensions in the middle—you're the 'logic balance master' that both product and code can accept.

22222.content_zh: 逻辑、耐心、细节、探索、反馈全拉满——你已接近赛博世界的秩序顶端。
22222.content_en: Logic, patience, detail, exploration and feedback all maxed—you're near the top of order in the cyber world.

10000.content_zh: 逻辑偏高、其余偏冷，像车间里只拧一种螺丝的扳手，高效且不废话。
10000.content_en: High logic, rest low—like a wrench in the workshop that only tightens one kind of screw, efficient and no small talk.

01210.content_zh: 逻辑中、耐心低、细节中、探索高、反馈低——你在荒地上开垦，冷静且有条理。
01210.content_en: Mid logic, low patience, mid detail, high exploration, low feedback—you pioneer the wasteland with calm and order.

21112.content_zh: 逻辑与细节双高，探索与反馈温和，你是团队里那个既靠谱又有人情味的基准站。
21112.content_en: High logic and detail, gentle exploration and feedback—you're the reliable yet warm baseline in the team.

12111.content_zh: 耐心高、逻辑与细节均衡、探索中位——你相信「重写」是为了更好的宇宙。
12111.content_en: High patience, balanced logic and detail, mid exploration—you believe 'rewrite' is for a better universe.
